title: Romantic Cottage Retreat Near Coffs Harbour
description: Just 20 minutes from the coastal city of Coffs Harbour, nestled amid the hinterland’s rolling hills of Orara, you will find a peaceful retreat perfect for a romantic getaway: Friday Creek Retreat. Escape the hustle and bustle and find your slice of country paradise staying in one of the property’s beautiful cottages, indulging in a loaf of freshly baked bread delivered to your cottage on the first day of your stay, a luxe bathroom amenity and a leisurely late 12pm checkout.
offer_address: 267 Fridays Creek Rd, Upper Orara NSW 2450
